1029540.name: Super Kittens
1029540.description:
Super Kittens is a game where you play as a kitten with super cuteness powers.
Explore space, travel across dimensions, and help save the universe using charm, creativity, and a whole lot of adorable chaos.

You have a kitten phone that helps you hack systems and teleport back home. While online features may appear in the future, Super Kittens is designed to be fully playable offline, making it perfect for Steam Deck and on-the-go gaming (including airplane mode).

You also have a computer terminal where you can view your kitten and interact with in-game systems. All upgrades and purchases use in-game currency only, earned through gameplay – no real-world payment pressure inside the universe.

Your powers include:

  • Cuteness Bombs – Stop enemies and heal you

  • Cuteness Bar – Weakens enemies and regenerates over time

  • Cuteness Potions – Boost regeneration speed

  • Cuteness Machine – Create bombs, potions, and upgrade your cuteness speed using your own cuteness energy

You can customise your kitten through the character customisation menu.
A fuel bar lets you travel to different locations, while the control panel maps out the universe and its planets.

Super Kittens is also the reflection of my personal journey of learning to program and create games in my own way. It’s about creative freedom, growth, and building something meaningful outside rigid systems.

Purchase Tip
For safer spending control, especially for shared accounts or younger players, Steam Wallet gift cards are a great option.

The game is currently in beta.
More content, features, and improvements will arrive in future updates.
1029540.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
